title: Minor Hotels targeting 50 new openings in India in within the next decade
description: Minor Hotels, a global hospitality operator, plans to significantly expand its presence in the Indian market by opening 50 new properties within the next decade. Focusing on upper-upscale and luxury segments, it aims to leverage its Anantara, Avani, and NH Collection brands. The group will prioritize greenfield developments in emerging locations, emphasizing partnerships with aligned values.
